bug.author: guybartal
bug.summary: add support other regions of custom vision service
bug.description: please add support for other regions of custom vision service apart from south central us, currently it's hard-coded and it's not that informative... I've discovered that only by enabling developer mode.

comments.comment: Yes, you are correct. We will extend the custom vision export provider template to include a region dropdown for the newly added regions.
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/guybartal>@guybartal</denchmark-link> - This change has been added and will be included in the next release. Feel free to try it out in the branch.
